description: Sub-component for `v-expansion-panels` that wraps the content to be expanded or collapsed.

props.readonly: Makes the expansion panel content read only.
props.focusable: Makes the expansion panel content focusable.
props.value: Controls the opened/closed state of content.
props.static: Remove title size expansion when selected.

events.change: Toggles the value of the selected panel.

exposed.groupItem: The current expansion panel within the group in `<v-expansion-panels>`.
